amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for Environmental Restoration, Air Force by $37 million and increases funds for mental health care by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Environmental Restoration, Air Force by $37,000,000 and increase funds for the Defense Health Program by $10,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (PA) amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy (PA) amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Murphy (PA).
